member.name: DirectX.XAPOAlloc
member.summary: Memory allocation macro used by IXAPO methods that must allocate arbitrary sized structures that are subsequently returned to the application.
member.param: Size, in bytes, of the memory block to be allocated.

member.name: DirectX.XAPOFree
member.summary: Macro used to free memory allocated with the macro.
member.param: Pointer to the memory block to be freed.
